data.system_settings: iPhone 6s, iOS 11.2.5 & iPad Air 2, iOS 11.3 PB 2
data.actual_result: Only the first image/file will be send.
data.expected_result: All images or other files should be send with multiple messages.
data.short_description: You can't share multiple files at once with the new share extension
data.steps_to_repro: - Prerequisite: Enable the new Discord share extension - Go to the iOS photo app and open any folder or all photos - Click on select and select more than 1 image - Now hit the share button - Select Discord - Send it and observe the result in the Discord app
